name: TheBackrooms
description:
Objective:

 Live as long as you can in the infinite backrooms and run as long as you can from the evil capsules & the invisible spectre (that will change the lighting when it gets near!).

 

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Mouse to look

- F to pick up food objects (a little janky)

- Shift to run

 

Notes:

 This is a game for bc game jam 2021, made in 48 hours.

 

Build Instructions:

 Uses the newest version of Unity (2020.1) -> There is a windows build on github -> https://github.com/EarthenSky/bcgamejam2021
